name: President Evil
description: My name is Tony Dramp. I am a simple ranger who lives from paycheck to paycheck. One day, I found a book that changed my life. I became president of Amerika! But that book turned out to be an ancient artifact and required payment for its services... Darkness enveloped my house and the forest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: AMD Athlon X64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5770 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: This game have x86 build only
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 TI DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: This game have x86 build only
